鐗鐗鐗
Links: aedict | jisho | koohii | hanziyuan | kanshudo | wiktionary | purpleculture | rtega | trainchinese | bkrs | humanum | Baido | yw11 | Pleco Search | Pleco

鐗字的基本解释

鐗
jiǎn
同“锏”。

鐗字的汉语字典释义

[①]［jiàn］
［《廣韻》古晏切，去諫，見。］
亦作“鐗1”。“锏1”的繁体字。
嵌在车轴上的小方铁。可以保护车轴并减少摩擦。
[②]［jiǎn］
亦作“鐗2”。“锏2”的繁体字。
古代兵器。金属制成，长条形，有四棱，无刃，上端略小，下端有柄。

鐗字的康熙字典解释

【戌集上】【金字部】　鐗； 康熙笔画：20； 页码：页1322第19
【唐韻】古莧切【集韻】居莧切【韻會】居諫切【正韻】居晏切，?音襇。【說文】車軸鐵也。【博雅】錔也。【釋名】鐗，閒也。閒釭軸之閒，使不相摩也。

鐗字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
鐗字的起名意思

暂无。

Qi
Basic explanation of words
Qi
jiǎn
Same as "Mace".
Qi
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［jiàn］
["Guangyun" Gu Yan cut, go to admonish, see. ]
Also known as "鐗1". Traditional characters for "锏1".
Small square iron embedded in the axle. It can protect the axle and reduce friction.
[②]［jiǎn］
Also known as "鐗2". "锏2" in traditional characters.
Ancient weapons. Made of metal, long strip, four-sided, no blade, slightly smaller at the upper end, and a handle at the lower end.
Qi
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Su Ji 1] [Golden Word Department] 　鐗; Kangxi Strokes: 20; Page Number: Page 1322 Page 19
[Tang Yun] Ancient Amaranth [Jiyun] Jumei [Rhyme] Ju Jianqi [Positive Rhyme] Juyan Qi,? Sound. [Said the text] The axle is also iron. [Bo Ya] Chi also. 【Release name】Cai, leisure. The idle nightmare axis is idle, so that it does not rub against each other.
Qi
